text: aur jo log eemaan lae aur unhonne nek kaam kie unako (ai paigambar) khushakhabaree de do ki unake lie (behisht ke) vah baagaat hain jinake neeche nahare jaaree hain jab unhen in baagaat ka koee meva khaane ko milega to kahenge ye to vahee (meva hai jo pahale bhee hamen khaane ko mil chuka hai) (kyonki) unhen milatee julatee soorat va rang ke (meve) mila karenge aur behisht mein unake lie saaph sutharee beeviyaan hogee aur ye log us baag mein hamesha rahenge
